cluster_id.description: The ID of the cluster to retrieve events about.

start_time.description:
The start time in epoch milliseconds.
If empty, returns events starting from the beginning of time.

end_time.description:
The end time in epoch milliseconds.
If empty, returns events up to the current time.

event_types.description: The order to list events in; either "ASC" or "DESC". Defaults to "DESC".

offset.description:
An optional set of event types to filter on.
If empty, all event types are returned.

limit.description:
The offset in the result set. Defaults to 0 (no offset). When an offset is specified
and the results are requested in descending order, the end_time field is required.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

post.description: Retrieves a list of events about the activity of a cluster. This API is paginated. If there are more events to read, the response includes all the nparameters necessary to request the next page of events.
